meanings.sent1: The faithless man never believed in anything.
meanings.sent2: She felt hurt by her friend's faithless actions.
meanings.sent3: The faithless cat refused to trust anyone, not even its owner.
meanings.sent4: The old house stood empty and faithless, abandoned by its owners.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds overhead seemed to mirror the faithless mood of the town.

meanings.definition: Not true to one's word or promises.
meanings.sent1: The faithless politician broke his promises to the people.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a faithless friend who couldn't be relied upon.
meanings.sent3: The faithless clock stopped working just when it was needed most.
meanings.sent4: Her faithless heart led her to betray those who trusted her.
meanings.sent5: The faithless river changed its course, leaving the town vulnerable to floods.
